title: Ukraine’s Quest to Build a Tank-Killing Grenade
description: A Ukrainian unit is using tape, a scale and a 3-D printer to build the perfect grenade. It’s a steep and risky challenge.

title: Benedict’s Burial Leaves Francis Alone, and Unbound
description: Liberal supporters of Francis, a pope never shy about exercising power, now anticipate a late-breaking season of change.

title: Iran Executes 2 Men Arrested in Protests
description: At least nine other protesters remain on death row, accused of crimes ranging from burning a trash can to killing security forces.

title: New Armored Vehicles Will Help Ukraine Take the Fight to Russia
description: The Western allies’ provision of infantry fighting vehicles signals their support for new offensives in coming months, analysts said.

title: At France’s Oldest Christmas Market, Energy Crisis Dims Festive Spirits
description: Amid soaring gas prices and the war in Ukraine, Strasbourg’s Christkindelsmärik, like holiday fairs across Europe, has faced a tough question: “How do you balance magic and responsibility?”
